adjustments: Clarified RWA asset channels: self-issued + partner ecosystem
Specified oracle choice: APRO (API3) + Chainlink backup
Added 5 missing user stories: RWA asset issuance (2), notification system (1), transaction history (1), referral rewards (1)
Elevated ERC4626 priority: P1 → P0 (B2D integration is MVP-critical)
Cancelled phased release: One-time delivery in 14 weeks (no Phase 1A/1B split)
User story count: 14 → 19 stories across 7 Epics
CRITICAL: Architecture model corrected - Changed from 'RWA issuer' to 'RWA aggregator'
Self-operated tokens: 3 → 1 (only PNGY, integrate existing BSC RWA tokens)
Technology stack finalized: Foundry + Next.js 14 + Node.js + PostgreSQL + Vercel/Railway
Created RWA asset research checklist to validate BSC ecosystem
Identified P0 risk: BSC RWA asset availability (requires immediate validation)
Identified 8 key risks (P0: 2, P1: 3, P2: 3) with mitigation strategies
Documented 5 technical constraints (chain, language, standard, compatibility, team)
Confirmed critical dependencies: BSC RWA tokens, APRO/Chainlink Oracle, PancakeSwap DEX
Established decision point: 2025-11-25 for BSC feasibility validation
Prepared 3 backup plans if BSC RWA ecosystem insufficient
